import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-check-box', templateUrl: './check-box.component.html', styleUrls: ['./check-box.component.scss'] }) export class CheckBoxComponent { toppings = this._formBuilder.group({ pepperoni: false, extracheese: false, mushroom: false, }); constructor(private _formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} }
